item.description:
This is an extra, fifth week for the the ongoing four week intensive.

For those who want to move beyond the introductory meetups, a four week healing and support group intensive is scheduled to provide a  supervised and safe environment for weekly learning and healing.  Each participant will be able to focus on the most challenging personal challenges and resolve them using the latest techniques in energy and quantum healing, while continually building on what was learned from session to session. Because of the small group size, participants will have an opportunity to receive individual intuitive consultations and healing. 

 

The exercises and practices will include among others

energetic displacement re-integration for anxiety, stress or panic

quantum shift in states of healing that does not require revisiting or re-experiencing one's trauma

 

Participation prerequisites - a four week commitment following the first session, and at least one prior introductory meetup attendance. If you have any questions regarding these requirements, please e-mail or call Yuliya 617-731-9529

 

Dates: Thurs Feb 24, March 3, 10, 17

Cost $45 - 1 session, $ 180 - 4 Sessions
item.how_to_find_us: Up the stairs next to the yellow "Children" road sign of a Victorian house with purple columns, to the porch, through the front door, then inside the door to the left.
item.why: A four week healing and support group that provides a supervised and safe environment to bring a resolutions to your personal challenges. Learn the latest techniques in healing trauma that do not require revisiting or re-experiencing one's trauma‚Äù

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: The Four-Week Support Group for Effortless Healing
